actions.text: Submitted in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent. Until the close of business July 24, 1986.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with regard to a vote on any amendment to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that no vote occur on any amendment to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) until there has been made available to the Senate membership a transcript of hearings on that topic held by the Committee on Governmental Affairs on July 23, 1986.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with regard to a vote on any amendment to the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act.
